sprites.description: Player character idle animation frames, showing slight weight shifts.
Player character running animation frames, depicting forward movement.
Player character shooting animation frames, including holding a weapon and an integrated projectile visual effect.

notes: The provided image dimensions (416x472 pixels) were used for bounding box calculations, as the prompt requested bounding boxes relative to 'this image size' despite also mentioning an 'image size: 1024x1024 pixels' earlier. The content appears to be a section of a larger potential sprite sheet. All character sprites are consistent in style and color palette, designed to be composed of multiple 8x8 NES sprites (hence 'size_16x16': true).
